Q2. How do I make payment for a JobsDB package with a credit card?
To make payment using a credit card, follow the steps below:
2.	Fill in your credit card information such as card number, name on card, expiration date, and card verification code (CVC).
Q3. Can I perform a transaction through Internet banking?
Yes. Payment can be made by HSBC / Hang Seng Internet Banking (Hong Kong)
•	Bill Type (賬單類別) : 01 Job Ad Posting (01招聘廣告)
•	Bill Payee Account No. (with Merchant) (賬單戶口號碼) : 13-Digit Payment reference
Q4. How do I perform an online bank transfer?
Note: Once the transaction is successful, please email the receipt to
•	Account Name: Jobs DB Hong Kong Limited
•	Bank Name: The Hong Kong and Shanghai Banking Corporation
•	Remarks or Message to Beneficiary: 13-Digit Payment Reference
Q5. Can I perform a transaction through the ATM?
Yes. Payment can be made via ATM operated by
The maximum cash payment per transaction is HK$ 5,000.
•	Bill Account No. (賬單號碼) : 13-Digit Payment Reference
Q6. How do I make payment for a JobsDB package with a cheque?
Note: Post-dated cheques are not accepted. Kindly attach your cheque to the Payment Advice (with barcode) and send it to us.
P.O. Box 10752, General Post Office, Hong Kong
Q7. Can I perform a transaction through Mobile banking?
Yes. Payment can be made by
HSBC / Hang Seng Mobile Banking (Hong Kong)
•	Merchant (商户) : JOBSDB HK LTD; or enter 432 when asked for Merchant Code (商戶編號)
•	Bill Type (賬單類別) : 01 Job Ad Posting (01招聘廣告)
•	Bill Payee Account No. (with Merchant) (賬單戶口號碼) : 13-Digit Payment reference
Q8. How to edit my billing details?
To change the billing contact for your account:
with the updated contact person name, position title, email address and contact number. We will revert to you within 1 working day.
To change the billing address for your account:
with proof of the updated address. We will revert to you within 1 working day.
